subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Interim Font Code Standard
msgSnippet: ... There are a variety of font/encodings out there now. Do what you want, but I do not recommend establishing yet another. Michael Everson *
messageBody:
On 16 Apr 2013, at 12:59, "Zyggy2" <jayson@...> wrote:

> No, just one. There is no standard now. If and when unicode comes through the mapping will be updated.

There are a variety of font/encodings out there now. Do what you want, but I do not recommend establishing yet another.

Michael Everson * http://www.evertype.com/
